review: Very Professional, nice mannered and technically well informed are the attributes I will assign to Dr. Aditi's interaction with me.  She was very skillful and soft handed with tooth that was bothering me.  Her time management was exceptional.  I hardly had to wait for the doctor to see me.  She understood the time constrains under which I was operating.  She managed the schedules.  I am highly satisfied with the treatment and the workmanship of Dr Aditi Gvalani.  I would definitely recommend my friends and relatives to Dr Aditi.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciative feedback Mr Desai. It was a pleasure to have you at our practice!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There was no waiting time. The appointment was on time. Time management and number of patients seated appears very efficient. 
The doctor enquired about my family members, whom she treats. Very easy to communicative with. Ofcourse, she had a mask on, but was laughing quite often, which created a friendly and happy environment.  
She explained the existing dental condition, after a thorough examination. Offered alternatives for areas where applicable (eg. Use of numbing gel or local anaesthesia). Suggested alternate treatment options and explained pros and cons. Gave her decision and asked if I was ok with it, before proceeding. 
Doctor's assistant was also friendly and appeared well trained and skilled. 
Treatment was carried out very well, with well-timed 10 sec breaks to catch a breath. So the doctor seems very perceptive to patient's condition and needs. 24 hours post treatment, everything still normal - no post treatment issues.
Overall, great value. In any case, the doctors are professionals who deserve their worth.
reply_text: Thank you for your gracious and detailed feedback! It is kind and appreciative words like these that keep us going:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
If you are scared due to pandemic, please donâ€™t delay your treatment as I did. 
  I delayed the treatment due to lockdown by popping some antibiotics and painkillers. I went to the clinic only when  lockdown was partially lifted. I was having severe pain and swelling from cheek to throat. Couldnâ€™t even swallow water due to swelling.  In this condition i called Dr. Gwalani and she  prescribed medicines to let the swelling subside as I couldnâ€™t open my mouth for her to work. 

I will share my experience with the clinic here- 
I was skeptical in going to the clinic. But the moment you go in, they check your temperature, you have to sanitise your hands, they give you the PPE kit which includes disposable feet covers and head cap. You are supposed to wear your mask till you are on the patient seat. The staff also wears their masks and keeps the clinic disinfected. Doctors also wear their masks, gloves &  gowns.  
Appointments are well managed so that you donâ€™t have to wait for your turn. 
Doctors are extremely polite and will explain the procedure before treating. They use state-of-art technologies to get that smile back on your face. 
Dr. Gvalani is quite experienced and she knows her job well.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind and detailed feedback Mayura:).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very gentle and patient. Does whatever treatment needed with precision and lot of care . She had done my root canalling years ago when she was much younger but was so good that even after a long gap I hunted her down and have remained her patient since then . I am a senior citizen and feel blessed to have her as my Dentist
reply_text: Thank you so much!I am blessed to have patients like you:)

review: Dr. Aditi took me in an emergency as my friend recommended her and I was in a lot of pain . She was extremely patient and did a great job with the root canal treatment which I was very afraid of coz of the pain . An overall great experience and was done with the whole process in just 3 sittings . Would highly recommend her . Thank you
reply_text: Thank you so much Roxanne for your appreciation!We are glad we could help!

Being an old patient of hers, would definitely recommend her for all dental issues !!!

review: It was not good experience at all. *** ** ********** ** ******** ***** **** *** Inspite of providing OPG XRAY she x-ray and increased the consultation charges to 900
reply_text:
Hello!
We apologise for any misunderstanding that might have led to you considering your visit to our clinic unpleasant.
Intraoral x-rays are required even in presence of an OPG for better image quality of the concerned area and hence accurate diagnosis of your problem:).
They also could not have been taken without your consent for the same.
Consultation charges remain at 500/- as listed on our profile. We apologise if we led you to believe the x-rays would be done free of cost. Thank you!
Hope we can be of service again.
